meanings.definition: The quality of being peppery in taste or smell.
meanings.sent1: I could taste the pepperiness of the soup with every spoonful.
meanings.sent2: The pepperiness of the salsa added a nice kick to the dish.
meanings.sent3: The pepperiness of the chips made them irresistible to snack on.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter had a pepperiness that brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The pepperiness of the curry lingered on my taste buds long after the meal.

meanings.definition: The state of having a sharp or pungent flavor resembling that of pepper.
meanings.sent1: The salad dressing had a subtle pepperiness that enhanced the vegetables' flavors.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the pepperiness of black pepper on my scrambled eggs.
meanings.sent3: The pepperiness of the hot sauce caught me by surprise.
meanings.sent4: The pepperiness of the ginger tea warmed me up on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The pepperiness of the chili powder made the dish unforgettable.
